Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class ConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.ConnectionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestListenableInterface, Runnable
public class ConnectionHandler extends Object implements Runnable, RequestListenableInterface
An Object to handle a single client independently, read and send from client's input and output stream, ping functionality to track if client is still connected
